name: Curse of the dice
description:
My first ever game for first Game Jam.

Play as litle dice, gather power from another dices and challenge the big one.

Unlock new abilities as you progress through the game

  • Left Shift - Sprint
  • Space - Jump

Used assets:

  • Cover Image by Littoralie
  • Sounds - www.mixkit.co
  • Rustic wood vector created by upklyak - www.freepik.com
  • Rock wall photo by kues1 www.freepik.com
  • Bark photo created by ArthurHidden - www.freepik.com

Thank you for playing!
